summary: Nearly a year before Barack Obama announced his candidacy for the presidency, two filmmakers began to roll cameras on the young senator. Over the next 19 months, across the USA, the daily events of the presidential campaign are chronicled.
cast: Barack Obama|Neil Abercrombie|Dick Armey|David Axelrod|Bill Ayers|Melissa Bean|Jill Biden|Joe Biden|Mike Blake|Wolf Blitzer|Tucker Carlson|Ronnie Cho|Hillary Clinton|James Clyburn|Candy Crowley|Jennifer Donahue|Tammy Duckworth|Ann Dunham|Madelyn Dunham|Dick Durbin|John Edwards|Jon Favreau|Robert Gibbs|Stephanie Grobman|Jane Hall|Carol Harwell|Scott Helman|Jacqueline Kennedy|John F. Kennedy|Joe Klein|Ryan Lizza|Jim Margolis|Chris Matthews|John McCain|Bob Menendez|Konrad Ng|Barack Obama Sr.|Auma Obama|Malia Obama|Michelle Obama|Sasha Obama|Sarah Palin|Todd Palin|David Plouffe|Condoleezza Rice|Bill Richardson|Lorenoz Rivera|Tim Russert|Melisanne Russo|Maya Soetoro-Ng|Suhaila Soetoro-Ng|Lynn Sweet|Jake Tapper|Paul Tewes|Bobby Titcomb|Chuck Todd|Tommy Vietor|Brian Williams|Richard Wolffe|Jeremiah Wright|Jeff Zeleny
title: Barack Obama: Camino hacia el cambio
